item.title: What Font Should I Select For My Project in var_year?
item.description: Not That One Unless you really want your readers to remember your article. Research from "The Design Journal" "An International Journal for All Aspects of Design", suggests you, the reader, will remember that title font more accurately. In fact, it was designed to have that effect. Your subscription could not be saved.

item.title: Design | Build Hello Business | Sketches. Scribbles on the back of napkins. Wireframes. Mockups. Prototypes.
item.description: Because it feels good to know your website design is original you. We help out with sexy ideas, and even put together prototypes and mockups you can view and share with your team online.
